title: [10/14/2016]  GD Votes - Update
body:
Hey GD!

Six months ago a [variety of changes](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/UPtMxrJA-4282016-general-discussion-changes) were put in place in GD as part of a testing phase to see how things went.  Among these changes were the removal of upvotes/downvotes for the main post in a discussion.

> There's a restriction in how much we can change with this but I have turned it off for the time being which only targets **discussion** upvoting or downvoting. This feature is still useable within comments of a discussion. This is subject to change debating on the general feedback during the testing phase from the community.

There wasn't a majority one way or the other in terms of feedback given about whether to leave them gone or add them back.  As such, we're reverting this change back to the original functionality to keep this section aligned with the rest of the Boards.
